name: Aphasian Abomination
description: The Aphasian Abomination is a Large Construct, notable for its high Dexterity and exceptional Wisdom, giving it enhanced evasiveness. It lacks physical strength, with a Strength score of 1, and is designed to manipulate psychic energies.
memorable: Its ability to create an Aphasic Field, rendering creatures within it unable to speak coherently and disrupting their spellcasting, makes it a unique threat.
goals: Typically engages in disrupting and dominating encounters through psychic manipulation.
relations: Constructs or other magically created entities may be seen alongside it or as its masters.
environment: Thrives in areas rich in magical energy or within psychic realms.
strengths: Possesses Magic Resistance, immunity to various conditions, and the capacity to operate without the need for air, food, drink, or sleep.
weaknesses: Very weak in physical confrontations due to an abysmal Strength and a lack of social interaction capabilities.
attacks: Uses Multiattack to launch three ranged Force Blast attacks, dealing significant force damage from a distance.
most_powerful_ability: The Aphasic Field effectively prevents spellcasters from using verbal components and can inflict psychic damage if they attempt to do so.
senses: It has darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive Perception of 19, enhancing its awareness.
skills: Skilled in perception, benefiting from its high Wisdom score.
additional_information: Amorphous trait allows it to move through narrow spaces without penalties.
Immutable Form grants immunity to form-altering spells and effects.
Made of Magic allows it to temporarily vanish in an antimagic field.
Inflicts psychic damage on attempts to dispel it.
Challenges spellcasters with its unique Psychic Distortion abilities.
